plot: Samantha, a US citizen is saved by Joseph from Cameroon, to pay back the favor and take further advantage of Joseph's skills, Samantha must first help Joseph with his own problems which will lead them into an unanticipated impasse.
title: Menages
plot_es: Samantha, a US citizen is saved by Joseph from Cameroon, to pay back the favor and take further advantage of Joseph's skills, Samantha must first help Joseph with his own problems which will lead them into an unanticipated impasse.
plot_en: Samantha, a US citizen is saved by Joseph from Cameroon, to pay back the favor and take further advantage of Joseph's skills, Samantha must first help Joseph with his own problems which will lead them into an unanticipated impasse.
